item.title: Gladiator 2 Box Office Is Climbing 2024's Highest-Grossing Charts After Passing Venom 3 & A Quiet Place: Day One
item.description: Gladiator II has surpassed another impressive box office milestone as it continues to move further up the charts of 2024's highest-grossing movies.

item.title: Tom Hardy's Venom Franchise Box Office Beat Three Original Avengers
item.description: Tom Hardy's Venom has managed to earn more at the global box office than 3 of the original Avengers with his franchise in Sony's Spider-Man Universe.

item.title: 10 Most Underrated Martial Arts Movies That Don't Get Enough Love
item.description: Several martial arts films feature notable actors and impressive fight choreography, but there are a few that don't get as much love as they should.
